text:
ezhome | Fullstack & iOS/Mobile Engineers | Fulltime | Fully Remote

ezhome is a Series B funded home services startup founded by two serial entrepreneurs (founders of oDesk and PatternInsight) who are passionate about creating a global/remote workforce. We're building a company that will become "The Amazon of Home Services" and are looking for phenomenal talent to join our team.

Here's more about us: https://www.ezhome.com/about Here's more about our remote teams: https://www.ezhome.com/careers/remote Angel List: https://angel.co/ezhome

Apply here: Senior Software Engineer - http://grnh.se/wev5f61 Senior iOS/Mobile Engineer - http://grnh.se/32sehk1

Or email Liz at Recruiting@ezhome.com
